title: John Temerian (Curated, Exotic Car Dealer)
description:
John Temerian is the CEO of a vintage exotic car dealership has the life story to back it up. He runs Curated, a Miami-based dealership that buys and sells investment quality “blue chip” cars. Think classic exotics like Countach, Miura, CLK GTR, XJ220, Bugatti EB110s, etc. John has owned, bought, and sold, hundreds of cars and his knowledge runs deep. He has great insight, stories, and a love of cars that is infectious. We go back to his youth when his dad decided to sell Lamborghinis, took him for a ride in a RUF, and couldn't understand why John liked Renntech Mercedes.

@wearecurated

https://wearecurated.com/

 

**Note: John's mic was having a small issue during the show so you may hear some soft clicks throughout. We did what we could to remedy it and we don't feel it ruins what is otherwise an excellent show.

 

Head to Policygenius.com/smokingtire to get started right now.

You get all the cars, one search. Check out https://www.AutoTempest.com/tst so they know we sent you.

Use Off The Record! and ALWAYS fight your tickets! Enter code TST10 for a 10% discount on your first case on the Off The Record app, or go to https://off-the-record.sjv.io/c/2765520/1021446/13139 

Buy your Dillon optics sunglasses through our site and get a FREE Smoking Tire t-shirt. https://www.thesmokingtire.com

 

Want early access to this episode? To watch the live stream? Bonus shows, or ad-free shows? Join our Patreon! Pro Driver patrons had access to this episode on 09/2/2021 Go to https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast and check out the tiers. It all starts at just $3/month!
